text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a little HD hi-def walkthrough
of my cookbook so here it is america's
family favorites the best of home
cooking 150 timeless recipes which means
of course there are no cooking times
given alright that was just a little
joke for sirs cooking times so basically
what i want to convey here is this is a
cookbook it's not the cookbook this is
not the food wishes cookbook this is an
american cookbook I was paid to put
together for P which stands for paragon
a huge UK publisher that wanted an
American cookbook so they hired me and I
basically cooked everything photographed
everything and put it together for them
except on certain pages there's a
handful of recipes that came from their
existing database of already published
recipes so everything in the book except
what's on these page numbers i cooked i
photoed and i can verify pretty damn
delicious alright so there's the content
i was able to write an introduction
which I'm very proud of and I even got
to put my fake signature at the bottom
that's me I also got the nice about the
author bio on the jacket which is kind
of cool they were going to have a
picture of me but apparently they went
with chicken and dumplings which
aesthetically probably a better choice
alright
I don't think mustaches really sell the
books so here's a little flip through
every recipe comes with a full page
photo very cool and like I said I did
all the photos except for the ones that
are marked on those pages everything
that came to the table was photographed
and sent to the publisher there is no
food styling there's no airbrushing
there's no rubbing shoe polish on the
chicken to make it all look delicious
and roasted this is real real food so
this may be the first cookbook of this
magnitude where absolutely no food
styling or food stylist was used just
the chef's cooking the food and snapping
the pictures so very proud of it again
not the food wishes cookbook but many
recipes from food wishes you'll
recognize some have been tweaked
a little bit some just as you saw on the
site already all right like the roast
chicken looks pretty good okay so stay
tuned for information on the blog I will
post it as soon as I know how the best
way for you to order this is you can get
it through Amazon but I'm probably gonna
have a link on the blog for you to order
it directly in that way I get a little
piece of the action okay so you can go
to Amazon now and pre-order it but you
should probably wait until I get all the
details about how where when and all
that kind of info but anyway I
appreciate your interest I'm very proud
of the book and I think you're gonna
enjoy it
and hopefully it leads like I said to
the official food wishes cookbook for
more information check food wishes calm
and as always enjoy
